snippet.title: Arctic Awakening - Official Gameplay Overview Trailer
snippet.description: In the latest trailer for Arctic Awakening, Goldfire Studios walks you through the premise of its narrative adventure game, and explores the relationship between protagonist Kal and his court-mandated therapy robot Alfie as they search for his co-pilot after a crashlanding in Alaska's arctic wilderness.
